Node.Notes: Apparently expression of extreme politeness spoken to strangers and means “if you consider me worthy,” spoken to a person of high rank.
Means "do not go on your way without spending time at my place."
Uncertain. Expression occurs only in gn18:10; 18:14; 2k4:16 and 4:17, but syntactically more problematic in gn18:10 and 18:14.
Uncertain. May be sensual pleasure (enjoy sex with her husband) rather than pleasure of having a baby.
Uncertain. Expression occurs only in gn18:10; 18:14; 2k4:16 and 4:17, but syntactically more problematic in gn18:10 and 18:14.
Uncertain. 3fs could refer to sin (outcry about their sin) or Sodom primarily. Many read 3mp—outcry against Sodom and Gomorrah.
